name: clarchik-claude-code
description: Clarchik's Claude Code setup for productive development

plugins.name: code-cleanup
plugins.description: Adds a /code-cleanup command for a clean up and refactor code

plugins.name: code-explain
plugins.description: Adds a /code-explain command to generate detailed code explanations

plugins.name: code-optimize

plugins.name: mcp-integrations
plugins.description: Integrates some MCP servers with Claude Code
